about_the_game:
You will become a student at a military academy studying the ""Ultimate Magic Law"" manual of magical combat, and work hard at your practical training!

Team formation

Form your team by choosing one of three characters randomly selected for each round.
You have five choices before the start of the first round, and one choice between rounds to strengthen your formation.

Each character has a special skill, so consider how they will work with your current team formation and find the optimal solution!

Character placement

Before the battle phase, you need to place the characters you acquired in the team formation on the field.
You can place randomly selected cards from your hand on the field by spending the cost (CP) required for each character.
The selected characters will be placed in order from the empty slot closest to the center.

How you place the cards from the opponent's hand, your own hand, and the characters remaining in your deck is the key to victory!
Once the placement is complete, move on to the battle phase.

Battle Phase

Once character placement is complete, press the fight button to begin the battle phase.
The placed characters attack in order, starting from the slot closest to the center. When all attacks are completed in the last slot, the turn ends, and you gain a certain amount of cost (CP) and place your characters again.

Victory

You win if you incapacitate all characters on the opposing team or reduce the HP of the opposing team's commander to 0!
